std::string ToStr ( const std::string &  str  )  [inline]

Convert the arg to a string. ///.

Parameters:
arg which is a string already. ///
Returns:
a string ///
Remarks:
Since it is a string already, no conversion needs to be done. /// ToStr returns a new string, so we match that.
